ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 179 INT8 tiles x 512 ops + 26 Matrix tiles x 8192 ops = 91,648 + 212,992 = 304,640 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 51 BF16 tiles x 256 ops + 26 Matrix tiles x 4096 ops = 13,056 + 106,496 = 119,552 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int4: 179 INT8 tiles x 1024 ops + 26 Matrix tiles x 8192 ops = 183,296 + 212,992 = 396,288 INT4 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: 256 heterogeneous tiles (179 INT8, 51 BF16, 26 Matrix). 16x16 checkerboard. 16nm TSMC.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Peaks @ 1.4 GHz (30W mode). INT8: 304,640 ops/clock x 1.4 GHz = 426.5 TOPS. BF16: 119,552 ops/clock x 1.4 GHz = 167.4 TFLOPS.
notes: Mid-range KPU for embodied AI. 256 heterogeneous tiles (70/20/10 INT8/BF16/Matrix). 16nm TSMC. 64MB distributed L3. LPDDR5 256 GB/s. For autonomous vehicles, high-end edge. 68-78% efficiency factor.
